title: Bug 136801Chart bind joint data set, data type change incorrectly.
description: Bug 136801Chart bind joint data set, data type change incorrectly.

set21.Create a chart2.Open chart builder, go to "Select Data" tab, select Use data set: data set3Actual Results:1.NPE will thrown
